channel.title: How to change the jframe colour of a client?
channel.description:
Hey guys, I need help with my clients Jframe, it has a costum white colour. But i know that you can change the colour of it. I want it to be black if it starts up. And not that white colour...
Any help is appreciated
-J.J.
